div.p: Ancestral state reconstruction (using equal rates) of four nest traits in the superfamily Meliphagoidea. The ancestral nest type of the honeyeaters and allies was likely to be a supported nest ( a), with a side entrance ( b), with globular shape ( c) and around 1 m above the ground ( d). Circle around ( a) represents families: Maluridae (blue), Pardalotidae and Dasyornithidae (purple), Acanthizidae (yellow), Meliphagidae (black).
